review: You will like this little device.  Not only can you put anything in Chrome on most TVs - you can cast your whole computer screen to any TV.  You can do this from any PC, laptop, or device on your network.  It works very well for me.
author: Harold N. Orndorff

review: I tried streaming a couple of times from my cell phone and it worked fine but other than that I don't see a real use for this device. Not sure what was the rationale behind making such a device.
author: rk

review: It's a good device. I found it very helpful while watching Netflix, Youtube, and even at presentations. All you need is the right app and you can do a lot with this. The big con - you can't access it's advanced config freely, thus you're stuck with the basics.
author: Apolo Andres Pino

review: I love that can download also any chrome app and play it on your TV. Its very consistent and the picture comes through very clear. In addition, I do can work on my laptop well watching a movie at the same time.  I only had one problem and all I did was reset the chromecast and it fixed. I would definitely recommend for friends and for lazy college students.
author: Tahira

review: Surprisingly easy to set up and transmit to through Youtube or other apps
author: Tandy
